From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Epstein 
Date: Wed, 31 Jul 2019 12:21:38 +0000 
Thanks =. Until we receive a  final report, we plan to tell the Court that the investigation is ongoing. 
On Jul 
31, 2019, at 7:58 AM, 
Hi 
wrote: 
The investigation is nearing completion. He was given an incident report for self mutilation yesterday and is 
expected to have his DHO hearing in the near future. The original claims against Tartaglione appear 
unfounded, but we are still awaiting the final report. 
Thank you, 
a 
Supervisory Staff Attorney 
CLC New York 
Metropolitan Correctional Center 
New York, New York 10007 
>.» ' 
Hi and =, 
o < 
> 7/30/2019 7:11 PM >» 
Is the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's injuries still ongoing? I ask because we have a conference before Judge Berman 
tomorrow morning, and we expect that he will ask us about what happened at the MCC. If the investigation is still 
ongoing, we will tell him that. If it has been completed, would you please send us any new reports and whatever 
documentation sets forth the conclusions that the investigators reached? 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00021529
